ğŸ“· Instagram Username to ID Converter Extension ğŸ“·

Looking for a quick and easy way to convert Instagram usernames to IDs? Our Chrome extension lets you effortlessly get Instagram user IDs from usernames, all within your browser! Whether you're a developer, marketer, or just curious, this tool is perfect for you. The tool is not affiliated with or endorsed by Instagram or Meta.

ğŸš€ Key Features

- ğŸ” Find Instagram IDs by Username
  - Instantly convert any Instagram username to its unique numeric ID.
- âš¡ Fast and Free
  - Get the Instagram user ID instantly, without any cost or subscription.
- ğŸŒ Online and Convenient
  - No need to visit external websites; do it all directly from your browser.
- ğŸ–¥ï¸ User-Friendly Interface
  - Simple and intuitive design for quick and easy access.
- ğŸ“± Works directly in your browser
  - Use it while browsing Instagram on your desktop for seamless integration.


ğŸ¯ Who Can Benefit:

- Developers ğŸ¤–
  - Integrate with APIs or apps that require Instagram user IDs.
- Marketers ğŸ“ˆ
  - Analyse user data and engagement metrics.
- ResearchersğŸ•µï¸
  - Collect data for studies or reports involving social media.
- Social Media Managers ğŸ‘¥
  - Manage followers, influencers, and customer interactions efficiently.
- Enthusiasts ğŸ‰
  - Anyone curious to find out more about Instagram users.


ğŸŒŸ Benefits of Using Our Extension:

- ğŸ†“ Completely Free
  - No hidden fees or in-app purchases.
- ğŸ”’ Privacy-Focused
  - We do not collect or store any user data.
- ğŸ’» Lightweight and Efficient
  - Minimal impact on your browser's performance.
- ğŸ›¡ï¸ Secure and Safe
  - Complies with Chrome Web Store policies and security standards.
- ğŸ• Time-Saving
  - Quickly access user IDs without manual searching or coding.

ğŸ’¬ Frequently Asked Questions:

- Q: Is this extension really free to use?
  - A: Yes! Our extension is completely free with no strings attached.
- Q: Will it work with private accounts?
  - A: Yes, as long as you have access to the profile, you can retrieve the ID.
- Q: Is my data safe when using this extension?
  - A: Absolutely. We do not collect any personal data or browsing activity.
- Q: Does it work on mobile devices?
  - A: This extension is designed for the desktop Chrome browser.

Sedang mencari cara cepat dan mudah untuk menukar nama pengguna Instagram kepada ID? Ekstensi Chrome kami membolehkan anda mendapatkan ID pengguna Instagram daripada nama pengguna dengan mudah, semuanya dalam pelayar anda! Sama ada anda seorang pemaju, pemasar, atau hanya ingin tahu, alat ini sempurna untuk anda. Alat ini tidak berafiliasi dengan atau disokong oleh Instagram atau Meta.
